params.name: tokenizer
params.description: The tokenized used to decode the tokens.

params.name: skip_prompt
params.description: Whether to skip the prompt to .generate() or not. Useful e.g. for chatbots.

params.name: timeout
params.description: The timeout for the text queue. If None, the queue will block indefinitely. Useful to handle exceptionsin .generate(), when it is called in a separate thread.

params.name: decode_kwargs
params.description: Additional keyword arguments to pass to the tokenizers decode method.
